Name: controller.setpoint.filter.enabled
Description: Whether or not to enable the Savtizky-Golay filter for the steering angle setpoint.

Name: controller.setpoint.filter.window
Description: Steering angle setpoint Savitzky-Golay filter window size in seconds.

Name: controller.setpoint.filter.order
Description: Steering angle setpoint Savitzky-Golay filter regression polynomial order.

Name: controller.setpoint.ramp.enabled
Description: Whether or not to ramp the setpoint.

Name: controller.setpoint.ramp.magnitude
Description: Magnitude of the ramp step in a single controller tick.

Name: controller.feedback.filter.enabled
Description: Whether or not to enable the Savtizky-Golay filter for the steering angle feedback.

Name: controller.feedback.filter.window
Description: Steering angle feedback Savitzky-Golay filter window size in seconds.

Name: controller.feedback.filter.order
Description: Steering angle feedback Savitzky-Golay filter regression polynomial order.

Name: controller.output.change.enabled
Description: Whether or not to limit the maximum output change between controller ticks.

Name: controller.limit.integral.enabled
Default value: true,Whether or not to enabled integral term limiting."

Name: controller.limit.integral.magnitude
Description: Maximum allowed magnitude of the controller integral term after scaling.
